pagename: Shield of Arrav/Quick guide/Black Arm Gang
title: Shield of Arrav/Quick guide/Black Arm Gang
displaytitle: Shield of Arrav/Quick guide/Black Arm Gang

properties.name: description
properties.value: You are now a member of the Black Arm Gang.

content:
Black Arm Gang[edit | edit source]

  • Talk to Charlie the Tramp located near the south entrance of Varrock. ( 5•2)…
    5Is there anything down this alleyway?
    2Do you think they would let me join?
  • Go down the alley (the door to the west) and enter the Black Arm Gang hideout.
  • Talk to Katrine. ( 1•1•1•1•1)…
    1I've heard you're the Black Arm Gang.
    1I'd rather not reveal my sources.
    1I want to become a member of your gang.
    1Well, you can give me a try can't you?
    1Ok, no problem.
  • Trade your partner for a weapon store key.
  • Go to the south-east corner of Varrock and look for a small room with a ladder. It's connected to the west side of the building with the Chaos Altar in it.
  • Use the key on the door and climb up the ladder.
  • Kill the Weaponsmaster, or use Telekinetic Grab to pick up two Phoenix crossbows without fighting him.
  • Pick up both Phoenix crossbows.
  • Take two Phoenix crossbows to Katrine.

You are now a member of the Black Arm Gang.

  • Go upstairs in the hideout and open the cupboard to the south of the stairs to find half of the Shield of Arrav.
rawContent:
===Black Arm Gang===
{{Checklist|
*Talk to [[Charlie the Tramp]] located near the south entrance of [[Varrock]]. {{Chat option|5Is there anything down this alleyway?|2Do you think they would let me join?}}
*Go down the alley (the door to the west) and enter the [[Black Arm Gang]] hideout.
*Talk to [[Katrine]]. {{Chat option|1I've heard you're the Black Arm Gang.|1I'd rather not reveal my sources.|1I want to become a member of your gang.|1Well, you can give me a try can't you?|1Ok, no problem.}}
*Trade your partner for a [[weapon store key]].
*Go to the south-east corner of Varrock and look for a small room with a ladder. It's connected to the west side of the building with the Chaos Altar in it.
*Use the key on the door and climb up the ladder.
*Kill the [[Weaponsmaster]], or use [[Telekinetic Grab]] to pick up two [[Phoenix crossbow]]s without fighting him.
*Pick up both [[Phoenix crossbow]]s.
*Take two [[Phoenix crossbow]]s to Katrine.
'''You are now a member of the Black Arm Gang.'''
*Go upstairs in the hideout and open the cupboard to the south of the stairs to find half of the [[Shield of Arrav]].
}}
<noinclude>[[Category:Shield of Arrav]]</noinclude>
